sentence: …with  that funding, and I believe it will give them too much flexibility in  supporting a broad range of the Administration's national security  priorities. However, Congress has yet to receive a final spend plan  from the Department that accounts for the full amount of that funding.  Given the broad increase in defense funding provided through  reconciliation,…
